code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var FAQs=function FAQs(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{margin:'30'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:" Q: My computer powers on, but nothing shows on the screen "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"A: Double check your monitor is connected to your PC correctly.
